entities.name: padfoot
entities.description: PADFOOT is mentioned as a name, likely referring to Sirius Black, who is also known as Padfoot.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: DUMBLEDORE is mentioned as the headmaster of Hogwarts, and Harry mentions that he might kick someone out.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: SNAPE is mentioned as a teacher at Hogwarts, who has been fascinated by the Dark Arts since school. He was famous for it at school and knew more curses than half the kids in seventh year.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: VOLDEMORT is mentioned as a name, likely referring to the main antagonist of the story.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: SIRIUS is mentioned as Padfoot and is talking about Snape. He was part of a gang of Slytherins who nearly all turned out to be Death Eaters.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: RON is mentioned as one of Harry's friends, who is bickering with Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: HERMIONE is mentioned as one of Harry's friends, who is bickering with Ron.

entities.name: aurors
entities.description: AURORS are mentioned as a group that killed Rosier and Wilkes the year before Voldemort fell.

entities.name: rosier
entities.description: ROSIER is mentioned as one of Snape's friends who was killed by Aurors.

entities.name: wilkes
entities.description: WILKES is mentioned as one of Snape's friends who was killed by Aurors.

entities.name: lestranges
entities.description: LESTRANGES are mentioned as a married couple in Azkaban.

entities.name: avery
entities.description: AVEY is mentioned as one of Snape's friends who wormed his way into the Ministry.

relationships.description: Sirius mentions that he and Snape were friends at school, but Snape was fascinated by the Dark Arts.
Aurors killed Rosier the year before Voldemort fell.
Aurors killed Wilkes the year before Voldemort fell.
Avery wormed his way into the Ministry.
